GeneDef.label: extremely low libido
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are a extremely unlikely to engage in lovin' with their partner.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Decreases the chance of lovin' to 1/10 of base. Low libido is 1/2.

GeneDef.label: very low libido
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are a lot less likely to engage in lovin' with their partner.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Decreases the chance of lovin' to 1/5 of base. Low libido is 1/2.

GeneDef.label: above average libido
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are a slightly more likely to engage in lovin' with their partner.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Increases the chance of lovin' to 1.5 times base. High libido is 2.

GeneDef.label: very high libido
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are a a lot more likely to engage in lovin' with their partner.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Increases the chance of lovin' to 4 times base. High libido is 2.

GeneDef.label: super libido
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have an extremely high chance to want to engage in lovin' with their partner.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Increases the chance of lovin' to 7 times base. High libido is 2.

GeneDef.label: hyper libido
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are so likely to engage in lovin' with their partner that it is problematic. This gene is believed to have come into existance due to a particularly cruel scientist who wanted to increase the number of test rats they had.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Increases the chance of lovin' to 10 times base. High libido is 2.
